statement.p: A city's population in the year \displaystyle{x}=1993 was \displaystyle{y}=1,576,800. In 1955 the population was 1,565,400.
Compute the slope of the population growth (or decline) and choose the most accurate statement from the following:

ol.li: The population is decreasing at a rate of 250 people per year.
The population is increasing at a rate of 250 people per year.
The population is decreasing at a rate of 300 people per year.
The population is increasing at a rate of 300 people per year.
The population is increasing at a rate of 500 people per year.
The population is decreasing at a rate of 500 people per year.

ul.li: D: The population is increasing at a rate of 300 people per year.
